snippet: Founded to teach Americans about Asia, an organization is trying to strengthen ties among Asians too.
abstract: Asia Society is expanding both physically and philosophically, opening new buildings in Hong Kong and Houston and working to strengthen ties between Asian countries.
lead_paragraph: Founded to teach Americans about Asia, an organization is trying to strengthen ties among Asians too.

headline.seo: Asia Society Expands, in Houston and Hong Kong
headline.main: Asia Society Expands, East and West
headline.print_headline: Asia Society Expands, East and West
